body:
Comment 1: 
Assignment between interface values is also confusing. The difference between the two
print statements below looks really unclear for the newcomer.

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"reflect"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	var x fmt.Stringer
	x = (*time.Time)(nil)
	println(reflect.ValueOf(x).IsNil())
	println(reflect.ValueOf(&x).Elem().IsNil())
}
